cancelSuccessBanner.title: Success
cancelSuccessBanner.message: %s task has been cancelled. If you have made a mistake, please email Inbound Ops Supervisor for any changes.

failBanner.title: Warning
failBanner.message: Error FOIA request task has not been cancelled

assignFailBanner.title: Assign Failed
assignFailBanner.message: Task unable to be completed or assigned.

taskActionFailBanner.title: Error
taskActionFailBanner.message: Task action could not be completed. Please try again at a later time or contact the Help Desk (Error message: %s).

completeBanner.title: Complete
completeBanner.message: %s task has been marked complete. If you have made a mistake, please email %s for any changes.

completeFailBanner.title: Complete Failed
completeFailBanner.message: Task unable to be completed or assigned.
